title: I accidentally turned my soul stealer vayne into a temp skin
body: Can you please help me, I didn't mean to turn my vayne into a temp skin i accidentally miss clicked. Is there anything you can do for me?

replies.body: Oh no!!  It's really important to be extra careful and give mind to the confirmation windows that appear before unlocking the shard.  I can't make any guarantees, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I know it's a rare piece of work, and worth advocating for.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
Then the most disadvantageous one needs a BIGGER confirmation window, not the same. Having identical confirmation windows isn't going to make you read again what you're doing.

Sorry to say but there is no way to get your shard back once it has been used/activated.

You can only hope to get another one... and yes I realize how small those odds are. I'm sorry.
